intro: Kibara nitens, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit. The plant produces showy, tubular flowers in a variety of colors, including purple, blue, and white. Its leaves are typically velvety and dark green, providing a striking contrast to the vibrant blooms. Kibara nitens thrives in bright, indirect light and requires well-draining soil to prevent root rot.
